Package app.manager

Class PlaylistLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.manager.PlaylistLibrary
  • public class PlaylistLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
    The PlaylistLibrary class manages a collection of playlists, providing methods to add, remove, find, and modify playlists and their associated songs.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Playlist> listOfPlaylists  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PlaylistLibrary()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addPlaylist​(Playlist playlist)
      Adds an existing playlist object to the library if a playlist with the same name does not already exist.
      boolean addSongToPlaylist​(Song song, java.lang.String playlistName)
      Adds a song to a specified playlist by playlist name.
      boolean createPlaylist​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new playlist with the given name if it doesn't already exist.
      Playlist findPlaylistByName​(java.lang.String playlistName)
      Finds a specific playlist by name with case sensitivity.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPlaylistNames()
      Retrieves the names of all available playlists.
      CircularDoublyLinkedList getSongPlayList​(java.lang.String playlistName)
      Retrieves the songs in a specified playlist.
      boolean playlistExists​(java.lang.String playlistName)
      Checks if a playlist with the specified name exists in the library.
      boolean removePlaylist​(java.lang.Object input)
      Removes a playlist by either name or playlist object.

    • Method Detail

      • createPlaylist

        public boolean createPlaylist​(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new playlist with the given name if it doesn't already exist.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the playlist.
        Returns:
        true if the playlist was successfully created, false otherwise.

      • addPlaylist

        public boolean addPlaylist​(Playlist playlist)
        Adds an existing playlist object to the library if a playlist with the same name does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        playlist - The playlist to add.
        Returns:
        true if the playlist was added successfully, false if it already exists or is null.

      • removePlaylist

        public boolean removePlaylist​(java.lang.Object input)
        Removes a playlist by either name or playlist object.
        Parameters:
        input - The name of the playlist (String) or the Playlist object to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the playlist was removed, false otherwise.

      • playlistExists

        public boolean playlistExists​(java.lang.String playlistName)
        Checks if a playlist with the specified name exists in the library.
        Parameters:
        playlistName - The name of the playlist.
        Returns:
        true if a playlist with the given name exists, false otherwise.

      • findPlaylistByName

        public Playlist findPlaylistByName​(java.lang.String playlistName)
        Finds a specific playlist by name with case sensitivity.
        Parameters:
        playlistName - The name of the playlist to find.
        Returns:
        The Playlist object if found, otherwise null.

      • getSongPlayList

        public CircularDoublyLinkedList getSongPlayList​(java.lang.String playlistName)
        Retrieves the songs in a specified playlist.
        Parameters:
        playlistName - The name of the playlist.
        Returns:
        CircularDoublyLinkedList containing the songs in the playlist, or null if not found.

      • addSongToPlaylist

        public boolean addSongToPlaylist​(Song song,
                                 java.lang.String playlistName)
        Adds a song to a specified playlist by playlist name.
        Parameters:
        song - The song to add.
        playlistName - The name of the playlist.
        Returns:
        true if the song was added, false if the playlist was not found.

      • getPlaylistNames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPlaylistNames()
        Retrieves the names of all available playlists.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of playlist names.
